TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DbType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的字段、属性或 对象的数据类型。

span.span: Specifies the data type of a field, a property, or a object of a .NET Framework data provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数类型是特定于.NET Framework 数据提供程序。The type of a parameter is specific to the .NET Framework data provider. 指定类型的值转换`Parameter`然后再将值传递到数据源的数据提供程序类型。Specifying the type converts the value of the `Parameter` to the data provider Type before passing the value to the data source. 如果未指定类型，ADO.NET 将推断数据提供程序类型的`Parameter`从`Value`属性的`Parameter`对象。If the type is not specified, ADO.NET infers the data provider Type of the `Parameter` from the `Value` property of the `Parameter` object. 一般情况下还可以指定的类型`Parameter`通过设置`DbType`属性的`Parameter`对象。You can also generically specify the type of a `Parameter` by setting `DbType` property of a `Parameter` object. 如果字节数组大于 8,000 个字节，ADO.NET 不能正确推断类型。ADO.NET cannot correctly infer the type if a byte array is larger than 8,000 bytes. 显式指定使用字节数组大于 8,000 个字节时。Explicitly specify the when working with byte arrays larger than 8,000 bytes.

related.span: 配置参数和参数数据类型 (ADO.NET)

span.span: Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types (ADO.NET)
Data Type Mappings

span.span: A variable-length stream of binary data ranging between 1 and 8,000 bytes.

span.span: A currency value ranging from -2 63 (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 63 -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of a currency unit.

summary.span: 日期和时间数据。

span.span: Date and time data.

summary.span: 日期值范围从公元 1 年 1 月 1 日到公元 9999 年 12 月 31 日。

span.span: Date value range is from January 1,1 AD through December 31, 9999 AD.
Time value range is 00:00:00 through 23:59:59.9999999 with an accuracy of 100 nanoseconds.

summary.span: 显示时区的日期和时间数据。

span.span: Date and time data with time zone awareness.

summary.span: 日期值范围从公元 1 年 1 月 1 日到公元 9999 年 12 月 31 日。

span.span: Date value range is from January 1,1 AD through December 31, 9999 AD.
Time value range is 00:00:00 through 23:59:59.9999999 with an accuracy of 100 nanoseconds.
Time zone value range is -14:00 through +14:00.
